topic.title: Contact management
topic.shortdesc: Contacts are managed via menu Management Contacts

body.p: Only GLPI users with an access to GLPI application are stored in the user repository. Information regarding external persons are stored as contacts. See . Each contact is characterized by usual identity information and also by phone numbers and email address. Definition of a contact type list permits to order contact by type. Export to vCard format is possible in each contact card.
